title: This Month's GTA+ Benefits
headline: This Month's GTA+ Benefits
subtitle: GTA+
content:
In addition to the recurring monthly GTA$500,000 deposited directly into your Maze Bank account, GTA+ members who've signed up for this month (June 25 - July 31) will also receive:

— An extra bonus of GTA$1,000,000 every month through August
— The Överflöd Pipistrello (Super)
— Access to the new Vinewood Club Workshop
— 50% off Agent Upgrades for the Bail Enforcement Office
— And more

Membership automatically renews monthly, cancel anytime. Visit rsg.ms/gtaplus for more info.
